cartridge_basiclti_link.blti:title: Architect's Scale Tutorial
cartridge_basiclti_link.blti:description: This tutorial was designed for students learning to use a six-sided architect's scale (ruler). The tutorial includes four interactive sections; reading feet, reading inches, a demonstration, and practice. Although all four are sections are interactive and provide immediate feedback, the grade returned to the LMS depends only on the final section, in which users are required to use a simulated ruler to accurately measure 3 consecutive lines. Both the length of each practice line and the scale of measure required are selected randomly. No partial credit is awarded.
